passive.name: Pyromania
passive.description:
After casting 4 spells, Annie's next offensive spell will stun the target.

Annie begins the game and respawns with Pyromania available.

spells.name: Disintegrate

spells.tooltip: Annie hurls a fireball, dealing <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage>. If the target dies, Annie refunds the Mana cost and reduces the Cooldown by 50%.?

spells.tooltip: Annie projects a wave of fire, dealing <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage>.?

spells.tooltip:

Tibbers becomes enraged when summoned, if Annie stuns an enemy champion, and if Annie dies. When enraged, Tibbers gains 275% Attack Speed and 100% Move Speed decaying over 3 seconds.

Recast: Manually issue orders to Tibbers.?

passive.name: Berserker Rage

If Olaf picks up the axe, this Ability's Cooldown is reduced to ? seconds, or fully refunded if ? seconds has elapsed.?

Twisted Fate also gains ?% Attack Speed.?

?

spells.tooltip:
Xin Zhao slashes, dealing ? physical damage, then thrusts, dealing ?. Enemies hit by the thrust are Slowed by 50% for 1.5 seconds.

Champions and Large Monsters hit by the thrust are marked as Challenged for ? seconds.?

spells.name: Audacious Charge
spells.description: Xin Zhao charges to an enemy, gaining increased Attack Speed and dealing damage to all enemies in the area, slowing them briefly. Audacious Charge gains increased range against Challenged targets.

?

Xin Zhao unleashes a sweep around him that deals ? plus ?% current Health physical damage and Knocks Back all non-Challenged enemies.

passive.name: Echoing Flames
passive.description: Urgot's basic attacks and Purge periodically trigger blasts of flame from his legs, dealing physical damage.

spells.tooltip: Urgot fires an explosive charge, dealing <physicalDamage>? physical damage</physicalDamage> and <status>Slowing</status> by ?% for ? seconds.?

spells.tooltip:

spells.tooltip: Urgot charges forward, gaining <shield>? Shield</shield> for ? seconds. The first champion hit is <status>Stunned</status> for ? seconds and thrown behind Urgot. All enemies Urgot collides with take <physicalDamage>? physical damage</physicalDamage>.?

spells.name: Fear Beyond Death

Urgot fires a chem-drill, impaling the first champion hit, dealing ? physical damage and Slowing for ? seconds by 1% per 1% missing Health, up to ?%.

LeBlanc projects a sigil to an enemy, dealing ? magic damage and marking them for ? seconds.

If either part kills the target, Leblanc refunds ?% of the Mana cost and ?% of this spell's remaining Cooldown.

The initial sigil deals an additional ? damage to minions. ?

spells.name: Distortion

spells.tooltip:

Vladimir drains his target's lifeforce, dealing ? magic damage and restoring ? Health. After using this Ability twice, Vladimir gains ?% Move Speed for 0.5 seconds and empowers the next use of this Ability for 2.5 seconds.

spells.tooltip: Vladimir creates a virulent plague, causing its victims to take 10% increased damage from all sources for 4 seconds. Health</healing> if he hits a champion, and restores an additional <healing>? Health</healing> for each champion beyond the first.?

Master Yi channels, restoring ? Health over ? seconds. This healing is increased by up to ?% based on Master Yi's missing Health.

spells.name: Wuju Style

spells.tooltip:
Passive: Champion takedowns reduce the remaining Cooldown of Master Yi's basic Abilities by ?%.

?

spells.tooltip: Ryze deals <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage> and <status>Slows</status> by ?% for ? seconds. If the target has <keywordMajor>Flux</keywordMajor>, it is consumed and this Ability <status>Roots</status> instead of <status>Slowing</status>.?

spells.description: Sion fires a short range shockwave that damages and slows and reduces the Armor of the first enemy hit. If the shockwave hits a minion or monster, it will be knocked back, damaging, slowing, and reducing the Armor of all enemies that it passes through.

At the end of the charge, Sion deals between ? and ? physical damage based on distance travelled. Enemies close to Sion are Stunned for between ? and ? seconds based on distance travelled. Enemies in a larger area are Slowed by ?% for 3 seconds.?

passive.name: Fleet of Foot

spells.name: Boomerang Blade
spells.description: Sivir hurls her crossblade like a boomerang, dealing damage each way.
spells.tooltip: Sivir hurls her crossblade like a boomerang, dealing <physicalDamage>?</physicalDamage> to all enemies it cuts through. Hitting non-champions reduces the damage to subsequent targets, down to a minimum of ?%.?

?

spells.name: Tempest / Cripple
spells.description:
Tempest: Lee Sin smashes the ground, sending out a shockwave that deals magic damage and reveals enemy units hit. If Tempest hits an enemy, Lee Sin can cast cripple for the next 3 seconds.
Cripple: Lee Sin cripples nearby enemies damaged by Tempest, reducing their Move Speed for 4 seconds. Move Speed recovers gradually over the duration.
spells.tooltip:
Lee Sin smashes the ground, sending out a shockwave that deals ? magic damage and reveals them for 4 seconds. If this hits an enemy, Lee Sin can Recast for the next 3 seconds.

Recast: Lee Sin Slows nearby enemies struck by the shockwave by ?% decaying over 4 seconds.?

spells.name: Dragon's Rage
spells.description: Lee Sin performs a powerful roundhouse kick launching his target back, dealing physical damage to the target and any enemies they collide with. Enemies the target collides with are knocked into the air for a short duration. This technique was taught to him by Jesse Perring, although Lee Sin does not kick players off the map.
spells.tooltip:
Lee Sin performs a powerful roundhouse kick Knocking Back an enemy champion and dealing ? physical damage.

Enemies the target collides with are briefly Knocked Up and take ? plus ?% of the kicked enemy's bonus Health as physical damage.?

passive.name: Night Hunter
passive.description: Vayne ruthlessly hunts evil-doers, gaining 45 Move Speed when moving toward nearby enemy champions.

spells.name: Tumble
spells.description: Vayne tumbles, maneuvering to carefully place her next shot. Her next attack deals bonus damage.
spells.tooltip:
Vayne rolls a short distance, and deals an additional ? physical damage on her next Attack.

This Ability triggers spell effects upon dealing damage.?

spells.name: Silver Bolts
spells.description: Vayne tips her bolts with a rare metal, toxic to evil things. The third consecutive attack or ability against the same target deals a percentage of the target's max health as bonus true damage.
spells.tooltip: <spellPassive>Passive</spellPassive>: Every third consecutive Attack or Ability against an enemy deals an additional <trueDamage>? max Health true damage</trueDamage>.?

spells.name: Condemn
spells.description: Vayne draws a heavy crossbow from her back, and fires a huge bolt at her target, knocking them back and dealing damage. If they collide with terrain, they are impaled, dealing bonus damage and stunning them.
spells.tooltip: Vayne fires a bolt that <status>Knocks Back</status> and deals <physicalDamage>? physical damage</physicalDamage>. If the target collides with terrain, they take <physicalDamage>? bonus physical damage</physicalDamage> and become <status>Stunned</status> for ? seconds. ?

spells.name: Final Hour
spells.description: Readying herself for an epic confrontation, Vayne gains increased Attack Damage, Invisibility during Tumble, reduced Tumble cooldown, and more bonus Move Speed from Night Hunter
spells.tooltip: Vayne gains <physicalDamage>? Attack Damage</physicalDamage> for ? seconds, extended by ? seconds whenever a champion damaged by Vayne dies within ? seconds. Additionally, during the duration:<li><spellName>Night Hunter</spellName> instead grants <speed>? Move Speed</speed>.<li>The Cooldown of <spellName>Tumble</spellName> is reduced by ?%, and grants <keywordStealth>Invisibility</keywordStealth> for ? second.?

passive.name: Junkyard Titan
passive.description: Every spell Rumble casts gives him Heat. When he reaches 50% Heat he reaches Danger Zone, granting all his basic abilities bonus effects. When he reaches 100% Heat, he starts Overheating, gaining bonus Attack Speed and granting his basic attacks bonus damage, but making him unable to cast spells for a few seconds.

spells.name: Flamespitter
spells.description: Rumble torches opponents in front of him, dealing magic damage in a cone for 3 seconds. While in Danger Zone this damage is increased.
spells.tooltip:
Rumble ignites his flamethrower, dealing ? plus ?% max Health magic damage over ? seconds, reduced to ?% against minions.

Danger Zone: Damage is increased to ? plus ? max Health.

Percent damage is limited to ? damage on Monsters. ?

spells.name: Scrap Shield
spells.description: Rumble pulls up a shield, protecting him from damage and granting him a quick burst of speed. While in Danger Zone, the shield strength and speed bonus is increased.
spells.tooltip:
Rumble tosses up a barrier, gaining ? Shield for ? seconds and ?% Move Speed for ? second.

Danger Zone: The barrier grants ? Shield and ? Move Speed instead.?

spells.name: Electro Harpoon
spells.description: Rumble launches a harpoon, electrocuting his target with magic damage, slowing their Move Speed, and reducing their Magic Resist. Rumble can carry 2 harpoons at a time. While in Danger Zone the damage and slow percentage is increased.
spells.tooltip:
Rumble launches an electrified harpoon, dealing ? magic damage, Slowing by ?% for ? seconds, and reducing the enemy's Magic Resist by ?% for ? seconds.

Hitting an enemy who's already Slowed by this Ability increases the Slow to ?% and reduces the enemy's Magic Resist by ?%

Danger Zone: The harpoon deals ? magic damage instead and the Slow and reduced Magic Resist are increased by 50%.?

spells.name: The Equalizer
spells.description: Rumble fires off a group of rockets, creating a wall of flames that damages and slows enemies.
spells.tooltip:
Rumble launches a line of rockets, creating a burning trail that Slows by ?% and deals ? magic damage over ? seconds.

Rumble can control the direction of the trail by clicking and dragging while casting this Ability.?

passive.name: Serpentine Grace
passive.description: Cassiopeia gains Move Speed per level, but she cannot purchase Boots items.

spells.name: Noxious Blast
spells.description: Cassiopeia blasts an area with Poison after a brief delay, granting her increased Move Speed if she hits an enemy champion.
spells.tooltip: Cassiopeia blasts noxious gas, <keywordMajor>Poisoning</keywordMajor> enemies and dealing <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage> over 3 seconds. Hitting a champion grants Cassiopeia <speed>30/35/40/45/50% Move Speed</speed> decaying over 3 seconds.?

spells.name: Miasma
spells.description: Cassiopeia releases several clouds of poison, slowing, grounding, and lightly damaging enemies that pass through them. Grounded enemies cannot use Movement abilities.
spells.tooltip: Cassiopeia spews venom, leaving toxic clouds for 5 seconds. Enemies in the clouds take <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage> per second, are <keywordMajor>Poisoned</keywordMajor>, <status>Grounded</status>, and <status>Slowed</status> by 40/50/60/70/80%.?

spells.name: Twin Fang
spells.description: Cassiopeia lets loose an attack that deals increased damage to Poisoned targets and heals her for a percentage of the damage dealt. If the target dies from this attack, Cassiopeia regains Mana.
spells.tooltip:
Cassiopeia launches deadly fangs, dealing ? magic damage. If the enemy is Poisoned, they take an additional ? magic damage and Cassiopeia restores ? Health.

If this kills the target, Cassiopeia restores 50/48/46/44/42 Mana.

?

spells.name: Petrifying Gaze
spells.description: Cassiopeia releases a swirl of magical energy from her eyes, stunning any enemies in front of her that are facing her and slowing any others with their back turned.
spells.tooltip: Cassiopeia unleashes a petrifying gaze, dealing <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage> and <status>Stunning</status> enemies facing her for ? seconds. Enemies facing away are <status>Slowed</status> by ?% decaying over the same duration instead.?

passive.name: Crystal Spires
passive.description: Skarner's presence causes crystals to spawn in set locations around the map. Crystals can be captured by either team by standing close to them. When near crystals his team owns, Skarner gains Move Speed, attack speed, and increased mana regeneration.

spells.name: Crystal Slash
spells.description: Skarner lashes out with his claws, dealing physical damage to all nearby enemies and charging himself with Crystal Energy for several seconds if a unit is struck. If he casts Crystal Slash again while powered by Crystal Energy, he deals bonus magic damage.
spells.tooltip:
Skarner slashes wildly, dealing ? plus ?% max Health physical damage to nearby enemies. If at least one enemy was hit, Skarner becomes charged for 5 seconds. While charged, this Ability deals an additional ? plus ?% max Health magic damage.

Attacks against champions reduce this Ability's Cooldown by ? second.
Attacks against non-structures reduce it by ? seconds.?

spells.name: Crystalline Exoskeleton
spells.description: Skarner gains a shield and has increased Move Speed while the shield persists.
spells.tooltip: Skarner gains <shield>? Shield</shield> for 6 seconds. While active, Skarner gains <speed>8/10/12/14/16% Move Speed</speed>, increasing up to <speed>16/20/24/28/32% Move Speed</speed> over 3 seconds.?

spells.name: Fracture
spells.description: Skarner summons a blast of crystalline energy which deals damage to enemies struck and slows them. Basic attacking these enemies within a short window will stun them.
spells.tooltip:
Skarner blasts crystalline energy, dealing ? magic damage, Slowing by 30/35/40/45/50% for 2.5 seconds, and marking for 5 seconds. Skarner's next Attack against a marked enemy consumes it to deal an additional 30/50/70/90/110 physical damage and Stun for ? seconds.

Consuming this Ability's mark or using Impale reduces this Ability's Cooldown by the duration of the crowd control.?

spells.name: Impale
spells.description: Skarner suppresses an enemy champion and deals damage to it. During this time, Skarner can move freely and will drag his helpless victim around with him. When the effect ends, the target will be dealt additional damage.
spells.tooltip: Skarner impales an enemy champion, <status>Suppressing</status> them for ? seconds, dealing <physicalDamage>? physical damage</physicalDamage> and <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage> at the beginning and end of the duration. While <status>Suppressing</status>, Skarner can move and will drag his helpless victim around with him.?

passive.name: Hextech Affinity
passive.description: Gain Move Speed while near allied towers and turrets deployed by Heimerdinger.

spells.name: H-28 G Evolution Turret
spells.description: Heimerdinger lays down a rapid-fire cannon turret equipped with a secondary pass-through beam attack (turrets deal half damage to towers).
spells.tooltip:
Heimerdinger constructs a Turret that attacks nearby enemies. Heimerdinger can have ? turrets active at once. Turrets slowly build up charge. At max charge, they fire a stronger attack.

If Heimerdinger gets too far away, his Turrets will deactivate after 8 seconds.

This Ability has ? charges.?

spells.name: Hextech Micro-Rockets
spells.description: Heimerdinger fires long-range rockets that converge on his cursor.
spells.tooltip:
Heimerdinger unleashes a barrage of ? rockets that deal ? magic damage to the first enemy hit. Additional rocket hits deal reduced damage.

Max Damage: ? magic damage.

Nearby Turrets gain 20% charge per rocket that hits a champion.?

spells.name: CH-2 Electron Storm Grenade
spells.description: Heimerdinger lobs a grenade at a location, dealing damage to enemy units, as well as stunning anyone directly hit and slowing surrounding units.
spells.tooltip:
Heimerdinger hurls a grenade that deals ? magic damage in an area and Slows by ?% for ? seconds. Enemies in the center are also Stunned for ? seconds.

Hitting a champion fully charges nearby Turrets.?

spells.name: UPGRADE!!!
spells.description: Heimerdinger invents an upgrade, causing his next spell to have increased effects.
spells.tooltip:
Heimerdinger upgrades his next non-ultimate Ability.

H-28Q Apex Turret: Place an upgraded Turret for 8 seconds that doesn't count towards Heimerdinger's max turrets, deals ? magic damage per shot and ? magic damage per charged shot. Its attacks deal damage in an area, Slow by 25% for 2 seconds, and it is immune to crowd control.

Hextech Rocket Swarm: Fires 4 waves of rockets that each deal ? magic damage. Champions and jungle monsters hit by additional rockets take reduced damage, and minions take increased damage. Max Damage: ? magic damage.

CH-3X Lightning Grenade: Throws a bouncing grenade that discharges three times, dealing ? magic damage. The Stun and Slow areas are larger.

Recast: Cancel this Ability.?

passive.name: Soul Eater
passive.description: Nasus drains his foe's spiritual energy, giving him bonus Life Steal.

spells.name: Siphoning Strike
spells.description: Nasus strikes his foe, dealing damage and increasing the power of his future Siphoning Strikes if he slays his target.
spells.tooltip:
Nasus' next Attack deals an additional ? physical damage. Killing an enemy with this Attack permanently increases its damage by 3, increased to 12 against champions, large minions and large jungle monsters.

This Ability triggers spell effects upon dealing damage.?

spells.name: Wither
spells.description: Nasus ages an enemy champion, decelerating their Move Speed and Attack Speed over time.
spells.tooltip: Nasus ages a champion, <status>Slowing</status> them by ?%, increasing to ?% over ? seconds. Their <attackSpeed>Attack Speed</attackSpeed> is also reduced by ?% of the <status>Slow</status>.?

spells.name: Spirit Fire
spells.description: Nasus unleashes a spirit flame at a location, dealing damage and reducing the Armor of enemies who stand on it.
spells.tooltip: Nasus ignites a spirit flame, dealing <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage>. Enemies in the area lose <scaleArmor>25/30/35/40/45% Armor</scaleArmor> and take <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage> over 5 seconds.?

spells.name: Fury of the Sands
spells.description: Nasus unleashes a mighty sandstorm that batters nearby enemies. While the storm rages, he gains increased Health, Attack Range, damages nearby enemies, has a reduced cooldown on Siphoning Strike, and gains bonus Armor and Magic Resistance.
spells.tooltip:
Nasus becomes empowered in the sandstorm for 15 seconds, increasing his maximum Health by ? and Armor and Magic Resistance by ?.

While the storm rages, nearby enemies take ? of their maximum Health as magic damage each second and Siphoning Strike has a ?% reduced Cooldown.?

passive.name: Prowl
passive.description:
Moving through brush increases Nidalee's Move Speed by 10% for 2 seconds, increased to 30% toward visible enemy champions within 1400 range.

Hitting champions or monsters with Javelin Toss or Bushwhack triggers a Hunt, granting True Sight of them for 4 seconds. During this time, Nidalee gains 10% Move Speed (increased to 30% toward the Hunted target) and her Takedown and Pounce are enhanced against them.

spells.name: Javelin Toss / Takedown
spells.description: In human form, Nidalee throws a spiked javelin at her target that gains damage as it flies.  As a cougar, her next attack will attempt to fatally wound her target, dealing more damage the less life they have.
spells.tooltip: <keywordMajor>Human Form:</keywordMajor> Nidalee throws her javelin, dealing <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage>, increased up to <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage> based on distance flown.?

spells.name: Bushwhack / Pounce
spells.description: In human form, Nidalee lays a trap for unwary opponents that, when sprung, damages and reveals its target. As a cougar, she jumps in a direction, dealing damage in an area where she lands.
spells.tooltip:
Human Form: Nidalee places an invisible trap for 2 minutes. When an enemy walks over it, they are dealt ? magic damage per second for 4 seconds.

? traps may be active at once.?

spells.name: Primal Surge / Swipe
spells.description: In human form, Nidalee channels the spirit of the cougar to heal her allies and imbue them with Attack Speed for a short duration. As a cougar, she claws in a direction, dealing damage to enemies in front of her.
spells.tooltip: <keywordMajor>Human Form:</keywordMajor> Nidalee restores <healing>? Health</healing> increased up to <healing>?</healing> based on missing Health and grants them <attackSpeed>?% Attack Speed</attackSpeed> for ? seconds.?

spells.name: Aspect Of The Cougar
spells.description: Nidalee transforms into a cougar, gaining new abilities.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: While in Human Form, applying Hunted refreshes this Ability's Cooldown.

Human Form: Nidalee transforms into Cougar Form, gaining melee Attacks and replacing her Active Abilities.

Cougar Form: Nidalee transforms into Human Form, gaining ranged Attacks and replacing her Active Abilities.?

passive.name: Bridge Between
passive.description: Udyr has four basic Abilities that swap between Stances and can Recast an Ability to renew it with additional benefits. Additionally, after using an Ability, Udyr's next two Attacks gain Attack Speed.

spells.name: Wilding Claw
spells.description: Udyr gains attack speed and his next two attacks deal bonus physical damage. Recast: Gain even more attack speed, and the next two attacks call lightning to strike the target.
spells.tooltip:
Claw Stance: Udyr gains ?% Attack Speed and his Attacks deal ? physical damage %i:OnHit% On-Hit for ? seconds. Additionally, Udyr's next two Attacks in this stance deal a bonus ? max Health physical damage and gain ? range.

Awaken: Increase bonus Attack Speed to ? and max Health damage to {{ q2totalonhithpdamage }}. Additionally, Udyr's next two Attacks call lightning six times, dealing a total of ? max Health magic damage to isolated targets (strikes bounce to other nearby targets when possible).
?

spells.name: Iron Mantle
spells.description: Udyr gains a shield and his next two attacks heal him. Recast: Gain an even bigger shield and heal based on max health over the next couple seconds.
spells.tooltip:
Mantle Stance: Udyr gains ? Shield for ? seconds. Additionally, Udyr's next two Attacks gain ?% Life Steal and restore ? Health.

Awaken: Gain ? Shield, restore ? Health over ? seconds, and Udyr's next two Attacks instead have ?% Life Steal and restore ? Health.
?

spells.name: Blazing Stampede
spells.description: Udyr gains movement speed and his first attack against each target will Stun them. Recast: Gain even more movement speed and immunity to immobilizing effects for a couple seconds.
spells.tooltip:
Stampede Stance: Udyr gains ?% Move Speed, decaying over ? seconds. Additionally, Udyr's Attacks dash him to the target and Stun for ? seconds (? second Cooldown per target).

Awaken: Grants immunity to Immobilizing and Disabling effects and an additional ? Move Speed for ? seconds.?

spells.name: Wingborne Storm
spells.description: Udyr surrounds himself in a glacial storm, damaging and slowing nearby enemies. Recast: Empower and unleash the storm, causing it to track enemies and deal additional damage.
spells.tooltip:
Storm Stance: Udyr surrounds himself in a glacial storm for ? seconds, dealing ? magic damage per second to nearby enemies and Slowing them by ?%. Additionally, Udyr's next two Attacks in this stance deal ? magic damage to enemies in the storm.

Awaken: Unleash the storm, causing it to follow Udyr's last Attacked enemy, deal an additional ? max Health magic damage over the duration, and Slow by an additional ?.?

passive.name: Iron Ambassador
passive.description: Poppy throws her buckler that bounces off the target. Poppy can pick it up to gain a temporary shield.

spells.name: Hammer Shock
spells.description: Poppy swings her hammer, dealing damage and creating a zone that will slow enemies and explode after a delay.
spells.tooltip:
Poppy smashes the ground, dealing ? plus 9% max Health physical damage and making the ground unstable.

The unstable area Slows enemies by 20/25/30/35/40% and erupts after 1 second, dealing ? plus 9% max Health physical damage again.?

spells.name: Steadfast Presence
spells.description: Poppy passively gains Armor and Magic Resist. This bonus increases when she is low on Health. Poppy can activate Steadfast Presence to gain Move Speed and stop enemy dashes around her. If a dash is stopped, the enemy is slowed and grounded.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Poppy gains ? Armor and ? Magic Resist. This bonus is doubled if Poppy is below ?% Health.

Active: Poppy gains 40% Move Speed and projects a field around her for 2 seconds that stops enemy dashes. Enemies who are stopped by the field are Grounded and Slowed by ?% for ? seconds and take ? magic damage.?

spells.name: Heroic Charge
spells.description: Poppy dashes to the target and pushes it back. If the target is pushed into a wall, it is stunned.
spells.tooltip: Poppy tackles an enemy, dealing <physicalDamage>? physical damage</physicalDamage> and carrying them forward. If Poppy tackles them into terrain, the enemy is <status>Stunned</status> for 1.6/1.7/1.8/1.9/2 seconds and take an additional <physicalDamage>? physical damage</physicalDamage>.?

spells.name: Keeper's Verdict
spells.description: Poppy channels a hammer strike that knocks enemies very far away.
spells.tooltip:
Begin Casting: Poppy begins charging her hammer for up to ? seconds, Slowing herself by ?%.

Release: Poppy smashes the ground, creating a shockwave that deals ? physical damage to the first champion hit and surrounding enemies, Knocks them Back towards their Nexus, and makes them Untargetable while they fly. The range and Knock Back distance increase with charge duration.

An uncharged swing deals ? physical damage and Knocks Up for ? seconds.?

passive.name: Happy Hour
passive.description: Gragas periodically heals upon using a skill.

spells.name: Barrel Roll
spells.description: Gragas rolls his cask to a location, which can be activated to explode or will explode on its own after 4 seconds. The potency of the explosion increases over time. Enemies struck by the blast have their Move Speed slowed.
spells.tooltip:
Gragas rolls a cask that explodes after 4 seconds, dealing between ? magic damage and ? magic damage and Slowing for between 40/45/50/55/60 and {{ effect2amount*1.5 }}% for 2 seconds. The damage and Slow increase with time the cask spent before exploding.

Gragas can Recast to detonate the cask early.?

spells.name: Drunken Rage
spells.description: Gragas guzzles down brew from his cask for 1 second. After finishing, he becomes drunkenly empowered, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies on his next basic attack and reducing damage received.
spells.tooltip: Gragas guzzles his brew, reducing incoming damage by ? for 2.5 seconds. After finishing his drink, his next Attack deals an additional <magicDamage>?</magicDamage> plus <magicDamage>?% max Health magic damage</magicDamage> to the target and surrounding enemies.?

spells.name: Body Slam
spells.description: Gragas charges to a location and collides with the first enemy unit he comes across, dealing damage to all nearby enemy units and stunning them.
spells.tooltip:
Gragas charges forward, colliding with the first enemy, Knocking Up nearby enemies for ? second and dealing ? magic damage to them.

This Ability's Cooldown is reduced by ?% if Gragas collides with an enemy.?

spells.name: Explosive Cask
spells.description: Gragas hurls his cask to a location, dealing damage and knocking back enemies caught in the blast radius.
spells.tooltip: Gragas hurls his cask, dealing <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage> and <status>Knocking Away</status> enemies from the impact zone.?

passive.name: Mortal Will
passive.description: Every few spells or attacks, Pantheon's next spell is empowered.

spells.name: Comet Spear
spells.description: Pantheon either thrusts his spear or throws his spear in the chosen direction.
spells.tooltip:
Tap: Pantheon thrusts his spear, dealing ? physical damage to enemies hit. Refunds ?% of this Ability's Cooldown.

Hold: Pantheon hurls his spear, dealing ? physical damage to the first enemy hit and ?% less to further targets.

This Ability critically strikes enemies below ?% health for ? physical damage instead.

Mortal Will Bonus: Deals an additional ? physical damage.?

spells.name: Shield Vault
spells.description: Pantheon dashes to a target, damaging and stunning them.
spells.tooltip:
Pantheon leaps on his target, Stunning for ? second and dealing ? physical damage.

Mortal Will Bonus: Pantheon's next Attack strikes ? times, dealing a total of ? physical damage.?

spells.name: Aegis Assault
spells.description: Pantheon sets his shield, becoming invulnerable to damage from the front and striking repeatedly with his spear.
spells.tooltip:
Pantheon braces his shield and engages enemies in a chosen direction for ? seconds, becoming immune to non-tower damage from that direction and dealing ? physical damage over the duration. After channeling Pantheon slams with his shield, dealing ? physical damage.

Mortal Will Bonus: When Pantheon slams his shield he gains ?% Move Speed for ? seconds.
?

spells.name: Grand Starfall
spells.description: Pantheon composes himself and then leaps into the air, landing at a chosen location as a comet.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Pantheon gains ?% Armor Penetration.

Active: Pantheon gathers his strength to leap high into the air. He throws his spear from above which in a small area deals ? physical damage and Slows by ?% for ? seconds.

Pantheon then crashes down as a meteor at the target area. Deals up to ? magic damage to enemies in a line (decreased by up to ?% at the edges of the area).

This Ability instantly readies Mortal Will.?

passive.name: Rising Spell Force
passive.description: Ezreal gains increasing Attack Speed each time he successfully hits a spell, stacking up to 5 times.

spells.name: Mystic Shot
spells.description: Ezreal fires a damaging bolt of energy which reduces all of his cooldowns slightly if it strikes an enemy unit.
spells.tooltip: Ezreal fires a bolt of energy, dealing <physicalDamage>? physical damage</physicalDamage> to the first enemy hit and reducing his Ability Cooldowns by ? seconds.?

spells.name: Essence Flux
spells.description: Ezreal fires an orb that sticks to the first champion or objective hit. If Ezreal hits an enemy with the orb, it detonates and deals damage.
spells.tooltip: Ezreal fires a magical orb that sticks to the first champion, structure, or epic jungle monster hit for ? seconds. If Ezreal hits that target with an Attack or Ability, it detonates, dealing <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage>. Detonating with an Ability refunds the Mana cost of that Ability plus <scaleMana>? Mana</scaleMana>.?

spells.name: Arcane Shift
spells.description: Ezreal teleports to a target nearby location and fires a homing bolt which strikes the nearest enemy unit. Prioritizes enemies stuck with Essence Flux.
spells.tooltip: Ezreal teleports then fires a bolt at the nearest enemy, dealing <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage>. The bolt prioritizes enemies affected by <spellName>Essence Flux</spellName>.?

spells.name: Trueshot Barrage
spells.description: Ezreal winds up before firing a powerful barrage of energy that deals massive damage to each unit it passes through (damage is reduced for minions and non-epic monsters).
spells.tooltip: Ezreal fires a massive energy arc that deals <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage>. The arc deals ?% damage to minions and non-epic jungle monsters.?

passive.name: Darkness Rise
passive.description: Mordekaiser gains a powerful damage aura and Move Speed after landing 3 attacks or spells against champions or monsters.

spells.name: Obliterate
spells.description: Mordekaiser smashes the ground with his mace dealing damage to each enemy struck. Damage is increased when hitting a single enemy.
spells.tooltip: Mordekaiser smashes the ground with Nightfall dealing <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage>, increased to <magicDamage>?</magicDamage> if it hits only a single enemy.?

spells.name: Indestructible
spells.description: Mordekaiser stores damage he deals and takes to create a shield. He may consume the shield to heal.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Mordekaiser stores ?% of the damage he deals and ?% of the damage he takes.

Active: Mordekaiser gains the stored damage as Shield. He may Recast this Ability to restore ?% of the remaining Shield as Health.

Minimum Shield: ?
Maximum Shield: ??

spells.name: Death's Grasp
spells.description: Mordekaiser pulls all enemies in an area.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Mordekaiser gains ?% Magic Penetration.

Active: Mordekaiser pulls enemies in his direction, dealing ? magic damage.?

spells.name: Realm of Death
spells.description: Mordekaiser drags his victim to a different dimension with him and steals a portion of their stats. If he kills them, he keeps the stats until the victim respawns.
spells.tooltip:
Mordekaiser banishes a champion to the Death Realm with him for ?s, stealing ?% of their core stats for the duration.

If Mordekaiser kills that enemy in the Death Realm he consumes their soul, keeping the stats he stole until the target respawns.?

passive.name: Shepherd of Souls
passive.description: <font color='#FF9900'>The Cursed Horde:</font> Yorick can summon Mist Walkers to swarm and attack nearby enemies.

spells.name: Last Rites
spells.description: Yorick deals bonus damage on his next attack and heals himself. If the target dies a grave will be dug.
spells.tooltip:
Yorick's next Attack deals an additional ? physical damage and restores ? Health, or ? Health if Yorick is below 50% Health. If this Attack kills the target, it leaves a grave.

When there are 3 or more graves nearby and this Ability has already been used, Yorick can Recast to raise Mist Walkers from all nearby graves.

This Ability triggers spell effects upon dealing damage.?

spells.name: Dark Procession
spells.description: Yorick summons a destructible wall at target location that will block enemy movement.
spells.tooltip: Yorick summons a wall of spirits blocking enemies' path, but not allies'. The wall can be Attacked, and disappears after 2/2/3/3/4 hits.?

spells.name: Mourning Mist
spells.description: Yorick throws a globule of Black Mist that damages, slows and marks enemies.
spells.tooltip:
Yorick throws a globule of Black Mist that deals 15% current Health magic damage (min: ?), Slows by 30% for 2 seconds, and marks champions and monsters for 4 seconds. Marked enemies continuously Awaken nearby graves (but not exceeding the maximum of ?), and take ?% increased damage from up to ? attacks by Mist Walkers.

Yorick and his summoned units gain 20% Move Speed toward the mark. Mist Walkers will leap once at marked enemies that get away from them.?

spells.name: Eulogy of the Isles
spells.description: Yorick summons the Maiden of the Mist that causes Yorick's attacks against the Maiden's target to deal bonus damage. The Maiden will also automatically raise Walkers from dead enemies.
spells.tooltip:

spells.tooltip:
Volibear gains ? Move Speed, doubled to ? towards enemy champions for the next ? seconds. While active, Volibear's next Attack deals ? physical damage and Stuns the target for ? second.

Volibear becomes enraged if an enemy Immobilizes him before he Stuns a target, ending the Ability early but refreshing its Cooldown.?

spells.name: Frenzied Maul
spells.description: Volibear damages an enemy, applying on-hit effects and marking them.  Casting this ability again on the same target deals bonus damage and Heals Volibear.
spells.tooltip:
Volibear mauls an enemy, dealing ? physical damage and marking them for ? seconds.

If this Ability is used on a marked target, its damage is increased to ? and Volibear restores ? plus ? missing Health.?

spells.name: Sky Splitter
spells.description: Volibear summons a lightning bolt at a location, dealing damage and Slowing enemies while granting Volibear a Shield if he's inside the blast radius.
spells.tooltip:
Volibear summons a thundercloud that fires a lightning bolt, dealing ? plus ?% max Health magic damage and Slowing by ?% for ? seconds.

If Volibear is inside the blast zone, he gains a ? plus ?% max Health Shield for ? seconds.?

spells.name: Stormbringer
spells.description: Volibear leaps to a target location, Slowing and damaging enemies beneath him while gaining bonus Health.  Enemy towers near his landing location become temporarily disabled.
spells.tooltip:
Volibear transforms and leaps, gaining ? Health and ? Attack Range for the next ? seconds.

Upon landing, Volibear cracks the earth, Disabling nearby towers for ? seconds and dealing ? physical damage to them. Nearby enemies are Slowed by ?%, decaying over 1 second. Enemies directly underneath Volibear suffer ? physical damage.?

passive.name: Unseen Predator
passive.description:
While in Brush, Rengar leaps at his target with his basic attack.

Rengar generates Ferocity whenever he casts an ability. At Max Ferocity, his next ability is empowered.

Killing enemy champions awards trophies on Rengar's Bonetooth Necklace, granting bonus attack damage.

spells.name: Savagery

Rengar's next attack brutally stabs his target for bonus damage.

Ferocity effect: deals increased damage and grants Attack Speed.
spells.tooltip:
Rengar's next 2 Attacks gain 40% Attack Speed. The first Attack critically strikes for ? (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleCrit%) physical damage.

Max Ferocity: The first Attack critically strikes for ? (%i:scaleLevel%%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleCrit%) physical damage and grants Rengar ? Attack Speed for 5 seconds.?

spells.name: Battle Roar
spells.description:
Rengar lets out a battle roar, damaging enemies and healing for some of the recent damage he has taken.

Ferocity effect: additionally breaks crowd control effects.
spells.tooltip:
Rengar roars, dealing ? magic damage to nearby enemies and restoring ?% of the damage taken in the last 1.5 seconds as Health.

Max Ferocity: Deals ? magic damage and additionally cleanses Rengar of crowd control.?

spells.name: Bola Strike
spells.description:
Rengar throws a bola, slowing the first target hit for a short duration.

Ferocity effect: roots the target.
spells.tooltip:
Rengar throws a bola, dealing ? physical damage to the first enemy hit, Revealing and Slowing them by 30/45/60/75/90% for 1.75 seconds.

Max Ferocity: Deals ? physical damage and Roots for 1.75 seconds.?

spells.name: Thrill of the Hunt
spells.description: Rengar's predatory instincts take over, <font color='#cd90ee'>Camouflaging</font> him and revealing the nearest enemy champion in a large radius around him. During Thrill of the Hunt, Rengar gains Move Speed and he can leap to the tracked enemy without being in brush, reducing their armor.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Rengar will also leap attack when Camouflaged.

Active: Rengar gains ?% Move Speed and True Sight in a small area around the nearest enemy champion for ? seconds.

After ? seconds, Rengar becomes Camouflaged and can leap without being in Brush. Leaping to the nearest champion deals an additional ? physical damage, shreds ? Armor for ? seconds, and ends this Ability.?

passive.name: Living Vengeance
passive.description: On kill or assist, Varus temporarily gains Attack Speed. This bonus is larger if the enemy is a champion.

spells.name: Piercing Arrow
spells.description: Varus readies and then fires a powerful shot that gains extra range and damage the longer he spends preparing to fire.
spells.tooltip:
Begin Charging: Varus draws back his next shot, Slowing himself by 20%. After 4 seconds, if not fired, Varus will cancel the Ability and refund 50% of its Mana cost.

Release: Varus releases the arrow, dealing ? physical damage, reduced by 15% per enemy hit (minimum 33%). Damage and Blight detonation effects are increased by up to ?% based on charge time (maximum ?) .?

spells.name: Blighted Quiver
spells.description: Passive: Varus' basic attacks deal bonus magic damage and apply Blight. Varus' other abilities detonate Blight, dealing magic damage based on the target's maximum Health. Active: Varus empowers his next Piercing Arrow.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Varus' Attacks deal an additional ? magic damage and apply a Blight stack for 6 seconds (max 3 stacks).

Varus' other Abilities detonate Blight stacks dealing ? max Health magic damage per stack (max ? max Health damage). Detonating Blight on champions and epic monsters also reduces his basic Abilities' Cooldowns by ?% of their Maximum per stack.

Active: Varus' next Piercing Arrow deals an additonal ? missing Health magic damage, increased up to ? missing Health damage based on charge time.?

spells.name: Hail of Arrows
spells.description: Varus fires a hail of arrows that deal physical damage and desecrate the ground. Desecrated ground slows enemies' Move Speed and reduces their self healing and regeneration.
spells.tooltip: Varus fires a hail of arrows that deals <physicalDamage>? physical damage</physicalDamage> and desecrates the ground for 4 seconds, <status>Slowing</status> enemies by 30/35/40/45/50% and applying ?% Grievous Wounds.?

spells.name: Chain of Corruption
spells.description: Varus flings out a damaging tendril of corruption that immobilizes the first enemy champion hit and then spreads towards nearby uninfected champions, immobilizing them too on contact.
spells.tooltip:
Varus flings out a tendril of corruption, Rooting the first champion hit for 2 seconds and dealing ? magic damage. Rooted enemies gain 3 Blight stacks over the duration.

The corruption spreads from its target to uninfected enemy champions. If it reaches them, they take the same damage and Root.?

passive.name: Staggering Blow
passive.description: Nautilus' first Attack against a target deals increased physical damage and roots them briefly.

spells.name: Dredge Line
spells.description: Nautilus hurls his anchor forward.  Colliding with an enemy pulls them and Nautilus together, dealing magic damage.  Colliding with terrain pulls Nautilus towards it.
spells.tooltip: Nautilus hurls his anchor forward. If it hits an enemy, Nautilus drags himself and the target together, dealing <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage> and <status>Stunning</status> them briefly. If the anchor hits terrain, Nautilus will drag himself towards it.?

spells.name: Titan's Wrath
spells.description: Nautilus gains a temporary Shield.  While it persists, his Attacks deal damage over time to his target and surrounding enemies.
spells.tooltip: Nautilus gains a <shield>? Shield</shield> for ? seconds. While the <shield>Shield</shield> persists, Nautilus' Attacks deal an additional <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage> over 2 seconds to his target and all surrounding enemies.?

spells.name: Riptide
spells.description: Nautilus creates three exploding waves around himself. Each explosion damages and slows enemies.
spells.tooltip: Nautilus creates three exploding waves around himself, each dealing <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage> to enemies in the area and <status>Slows</status> them by ?% decaying over ? seconds.?

spells.name: Depth Charge
spells.description: Nautilus fires a shockwave into the earth that chases an opponent. This shockwave rips up the earth above it, knocking enemies into the air. When it reaches the opponent, the shockwave erupts, knocking his target into the air and stunning them.
spells.tooltip: Nautilus fires a shockwave that chases an enemy champion, dealing <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage>, <status>Knocking</status> them <status>Up</status> and <status>Stunning</status> them for ? seconds. Other enemies hit by the shockwave are also <status>Knocked Up</status> and <status>Stunned</status> and take <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage>.?

passive.name: Glorious Evolution
passive.description: Viktor can augment his basic abilities when he gets kills on enemies.

spells.name: Siphon Power
spells.description:
Viktor blasts an enemy unit dealing magic damage, gaining a shield and empowering his next basic attack.

Augment: Siphon Power's shield is increased by 60% and Viktor gains bonus Move Speed after casting.
spells.tooltip:
Viktor blasts an enemy, dealing ? magic damage and granting Viktor ? Shield for ? seconds.

Viktor's next Attack within 3.5 seconds deals an additional ? magic damage.

Upgraded: Grants ? Shield and Viktor additionally gains ?% Move Speed for ? seconds.?

spells.name: Gravity Field
spells.description:
Viktor conjures a heavy gravitational field that slows enemies in its radius. Enemies who stay within the device for too long are stunned.

Augment: Viktor's non-periodic spells apply a slow to enemies.
spells.tooltip:
Viktor deploys a gravitational imprisonment device for ? seconds, Slowing enemies inside by ?%. Enemies inside for 1.5 seconds are Stunned for ? seconds.

Upgraded Passive: Viktor's non-ultimate Abilities Slow by ?% for 1 second.

?

spells.name: Death Ray
spells.description:
Viktor uses his robotic arm to fire a chaos beam that cuts across the field in a line, dealing damage to all enemies in its path.

Augment: An explosion follows the Death Ray's wake, dealing magic damage.
spells.tooltip:
Viktor fires a death ray in a chosen direction, dealing ? magic damage to enemies hit.

Upgraded: An aftershock follows the death ray, dealing ? magic damage.?

spells.name: Chaos Storm
spells.description:
Viktor conjures a singularity on the field which deals magic damage and interrupts enemy channels. The singularity then periodically does magic damage to all nearby enemies. Viktor can redirect the singularity.

Augment: The Chaos Storm moves 25% faster.
spells.tooltip:
Viktor conjures a chaos storm in an area for ? seconds, instantly dealing ? magic damage then dealing ? magic damage per second to surrounding enemies. The storm automatically follows champions it has recently damaged.

Recast: Viktor manually moves the storm.

Upgrade: The storm moves ?% faster.?

passive.name: Fury of the North
passive.description: After being out of combat, Sejuani gains Frost Armor which grants Armor and Magic Resist and immunity to slows. Frost Armor persists for a short time after Sejuani takes damage.  Sejuani can damage a stunned enemy to shatter it, dealing massive magic damage.

spells.name: Arctic Assault
spells.description: Sejuani charges forward, knocking enemies into the air. The charge stops after hitting an enemy champion.
spells.tooltip: Sejuani charges, dealing <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage> to enemies and <status>Knocking</status> them <status>Up</status> for 0.5 seconds. The charge ends after hitting an enemy champion.?

spells.name: Winter's Wrath
spells.description: Sejuani swings her mace twice, dealing damage, slowing enemies and applying Frost stacks.
spells.tooltip:
Sejuani swings her flail, dealing ? physical damage and Knocking Back minions and jungle monsters. She then lashes out again, dealing ? physical damage and briefly Slowing targets.

Both swings apply stacks of Permafrost.?

spells.name: Permafrost
spells.description: Sejuani freezes and stuns an enemy champion that has maximum Frost stacks.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Nearby melee allied champions' Attacks apply a stack to champions and jungle monsters.

Active: Sejuani deals ? magic damage to target enemy with 4 stacks and Stuns them for 1 second. ?

spells.name: Glacial Prison

If the bola travels at least 25% of its range, it Stuns and reveals for 1.5 seconds instead. It then also creates an ice storm that Slows surrounding enemies by 80% for 2 seconds. All affected enemies take ? magic damage.?

passive.name: Duelist's Dance
passive.description: Fiora has revealed a <keywordMajor>Vital</keywordMajor> on this Champion. If she hits the <keywordMajor>Vital</keywordMajor>, she <healing>restores Health</healing> and gains <speed>Move Speed</speed>.

spells.tooltip:
Fiora lunges in a direction and stabs the closest enemy, ward, or structure, dealing ? physical damage. The strike will prioritize Vitals and enemies it will kill.

If Fiora strikes an enemy, this Ability's Cooldown is reduced by ?%.?

spells.name: Riposte
spells.description: Fiora parries all incoming damage and disables for a short time, then stabs in a direction. This stab slows the first enemy champion hit, or stuns them if Fiora blocked an immobilizing effect with this ability.
spells.tooltip: Fiora parries all incoming damage, disables, and negative effects for ? seconds, then stabs. The stab deals <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage> to the first champion hit and <status>Slows</status> both <speed>Move Speed</speed> and <attackSpeed>Attack Speed by ?%</attackSpeed> for ? seconds. If Fiora parries an <status>Immobilizing</status> effect, the stabbed enemy is <status>Stunned</status> rather than <status>Slowed</status>.?

spells.name: Bladework

spells.tooltip: Fiora gains <attackSpeed>?% Attack Speed</attackSpeed> for her next two Attacks. The first Attack <status>Slows</status> by ?% for ? second. The second Attack always critically strikes for <physicalDamage>?% damage</physicalDamage>.?

spells.tooltip:
Passive: Duelist's Dance Move Speed bonus is increased to ?%.

Active: Fiora reveals all four Vitals on a champion for a max of ? max Health true damage and gains Duelist's Dance's Move Speed bonus while near the target.

If Fiora strikes all four Vitals within ? seconds or if the target dies after she has hit at least one, Fiora restores ? Health per second to surrounding allied champions for between ? to ? seconds, scaling with the number of Vitals hit.?

passive.name: Short Fuse
passive.description: Periodically, Ziggs' next basic attack deals bonus magic damage. This cooldown is reduced whenever Ziggs uses an ability.

spells.name: Bouncing Bomb
spells.description: Ziggs throws a bouncing bomb that deals magic damage.
spells.tooltip: Ziggs throws a bouncing bomb that deals <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage>.?

spells.name: Satchel Charge
spells.description: Ziggs flings an explosive charge that detonates after 4 seconds, or when this ability is activated again. The explosion deals magic damage to enemies, knocking them away. Ziggs is also knocked away, but takes no damage. Ziggs can use the Satchel to hexplode vulnerable enemy turrets.
spells.tooltip:
Ziggs flings an explosive charge that detonates after 4 seconds, or when this ability is Recast. It deals ? magic damage to enemies and Knocks them Back. Ziggs is also knocked away, but takes no damage.

Satchel Charge will automatically destroy towers below {{ f1*100 }}% of their Health.?

spells.name: Hexplosive Minefield
spells.description: Ziggs scatters proximity mines that detonate on enemy contact, dealing magic damage and slowing. Successive mine detonations on the same target deal reduced damage.
spells.tooltip: Ziggs scatters proximity mines that detonate on enemy contact, dealing <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage> and <status>Slows</status> by ?% for 1.5 seconds. Mines last 10 seconds.?

spells.description: Ziggs deploys his ultimate creation, the Mega Inferno Bomb, hurling it an enormous distance. Enemies in the primary blast zone take more damage than those farther away.
spells.tooltip: Ziggs hurls his ultimate creation, dealing <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage> in the center of the blast radius, or <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage> at the edge.?

passive.name: Pix, Faerie Companion
passive.description: Pix fires magical bolts of energy whenever the champion he's following attacks another enemy unit. These bolts are homing, but can be intercepted by other units.

spells.name: Glitterlance
spells.description: Pix and Lulu each fire a bolt of magical energy that damages and heavily slows all enemies it hits.
spells.tooltip:
Lulu and Pix each fire a piercing bolt dealing ? magic damage and Slowing by 80%, decaying over 2 seconds.

Enemies take ? magic damage from additional bolts.?

spells.name: Whimsy
spells.description: If cast on an ally, grants them Attack Speed and Move Speed for a short time. If cast on an enemy, turns them into an adorable critter that can't attack or cast spells.
spells.tooltip:
When used on an ally, Lulu grants ? Move Speed and 25/27.5/30/32.5/35% Attack Speed for 3/3.25/3.5/3.75/4 seconds.

When used on an enemy, Lulu Polymorphs them for 1.2/1.4/1.6/1.8/2 seconds.?

spells.name: Help, Pix!
spells.description: If cast on an ally, commands Pix to jump to an ally and shield them. He then follows them and aids their attacks. If cast on an enemy, commands Pix to jump to an enemy and damage them. He then follows them and grants you vision of that enemy.
spells.tooltip:
When used on an ally, Pix jumps to them and grants Pix, Faerie Companion for 6 seconds. If the ally is a champion, Pix also grants ? Shield for 2.5 seconds.

When used on an enemy champion, Pix hampers them, dealing ? magic damage and granting True Sight of them for 4 seconds.?

spells.name: Wild Growth
spells.description: Lulu enlarges an ally, knocking nearby enemies into the air and granting the ally a large amount of bonus health. For the next few seconds, that ally gains an aura that slows nearby enemies.
spells.tooltip: Lulu enlarges an ally, <status>Knocking Up</status> surrounding enemies for ? seconds. The enlarged ally gains <healing>? max Health</healing> and <status>Slows</status> surrounding enemies by ?% for ? seconds.?

passive.name: League of Draven
passive.description: Draven gains his fans' Adoration when he catches a Spinning Axe or kills a minion, monster, or tower. Killing enemy champions grants Draven bonus gold based on how much Adoration he has.

spells.name: Spinning Axe

spells.tooltip:
Draven readies a Spinning Axe, causing his next Attack to deal an additional ? physical damage and ricochet into the air. If Draven catches it, he readies another Spinning Axe.

Draven can hold two Spinning Axes at once.?

spells.name: Blood Rush
spells.description: Draven gains increased Move Speed and Attack Speed. The Move Speed bonus decreases rapidly over its duration. Catching a Spinning Axe will refresh the cooldown of Blood Rush.
spells.tooltip:
Draven becomes Ghosted, gains 50/55/60/65/70% Move Speed decaying over 1.5 seconds and 20/25/30/35/40% Attack Speed for 3 seconds.

When Draven catches a Spinning Axe, this Ability's Cooldown is refreshed.?

spells.name: Stand Aside
spells.description: Draven throws his axes, dealing physical damage to targets hit and knocking them aside. Targets hit are slowed.
spells.tooltip: Draven chucks a sideways axe that deals <physicalDamage>? physical damage</physicalDamage>, <status>Knocks Back</status>, and <status>Slows</status> by 20/25/30/35/40% for 2 seconds.?

spells.name: Whirling Death
spells.description: Draven hurls two massive axes to deal physical damage to each unit struck. Whirling Death slowly reverses direction and returns to Draven after striking an enemy champion. Draven may also activate this ability while the axes are in flight to cause it to return early. Deals less damage for each unit hit and resets when the axes reverse direction. Executes enemies who have less health than Draven's number of Adoration stacks.
spells.tooltip:
Draven hurls two massive axes that deal ? physical damage. Upon hitting a champion or Recasting, they reverse direction and return to Draven. The axes deal ?% less damage for each enemy hit, down to a minimum of ?%.

If Whirling Death would leave an enemy champion with less health than ?% of Draven's current League of Draven stacks (?), he will execute them.?

passive.name: Warpath
passive.description: Hecarim gains Attack Damage equal to a percentage of his bonus Move Speed.

spells.name: Rampage
spells.description: Hecarim cleaves nearby enemies dealing physical damage. If Hecarim damages at least one enemy, he increases the damage and lowers the cooldown of subsequent Rampages.
spells.tooltip:
Hecarim cleaves nearby enemies for ? physical damage. If this Ability hits, he gains a stack that decreases its Cooldown by ? seconds and increases its damage by ?% for 8 seconds. Stacks up to 3 times.
?

spells.name: Spirit of Dread
spells.description: Hecarim gains Armor and Magic Resist. Hecarim deals magic damage to nearby enemies, and gains Health equal to a percentage of any damage those enemies suffer.
spells.tooltip:
Hecarim deals ? magic damage over ? seconds to nearby enemies.

Hecarim gains ? Armor and Magic Resist and heals for ?% of damage nearby enemies take from Hecarim and ?% of damage taken from his allies.?

spells.name: Devastating Charge
spells.description: Hecarim gains increasing Move Speed and can move through units for a short duration. His next attack knocks the target back and deals additional physical damage based on the distance he has traveled since activating the ability.
spells.tooltip: Hecarim becomes Ghosted and gains <speed>?% Move Speed</speed> increasing to <speed>?%</speed> over 4 seconds. His next Attack <status>Knocks Back</status> and deals between <physicalDamage>?</physicalDamage> and <physicalDamage>? physical damage</physicalDamage>. <status>Knock Back</status> distance and damage scales with distance travelled during this Ability.?

spells.name: Onslaught of Shadows
spells.description: Hecarim summons spectral riders and charges forward, dealing magic damage in a line. Hecarim creates a shockwave when he finishes his charge, causing nearby enemies to flee in terror.
spells.tooltip: Hecarim summons spectral riders and charges forward, dealing <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage>. Hecarim unleashes a shockwave at the end of the charge that <status>Fears</status> for between ? to ? seconds, increased by charge distance.?

passive.name: Unseen Threat
passive.description:
Nearby enemies that are Isolated from their allies are marked. Kha'Zix's abilities have interactions with Isolated targets.

When Kha'Zix is not visible to the enemy team, he gains Unseen Threat, causing his next basic attack against an enemy champion to deal bonus magic damage and slow them for a few seconds.

spells.name: Taste Their Fear
spells.description: Deals physical damage to the target. Damage increased on <font color='#FFF673'>Isolated</font> targets. If he chooses to <font color='#00DD33'>Evolve Reaper Claws</font>, this refunds a percent of it's cooldown against <font color='#FFF673'>Isolated</font> targets. Kha'Zix also gains increased range on his basic attacks and Taste Their Fear.
spells.tooltip: Kha'Zix slashes a nearby enemy, dealing <physicalDamage>? physical damage</physicalDamage>. This deals <physicalDamage>? damage</physicalDamage> instead to enemies <keywordMajor>Isolated</keywordMajor> from their allies. ?

spells.name: Void Spike
spells.description: Kha'Zix fires exploding spikes that deal physical damage to enemies hit. Kha'Zix is healed if he is also within the explosion radius. If he chooses to <font color='#00DD33'>Evolve Spike Racks</font>, Void Spike now fires three spikes in a cone, slow enemies hit, and reveals enemy champions hit for 2 seconds. <font color='#FFF673'>Isolated</font> targets are slowed for extra.
spells.tooltip: Kha'Zix fires a spike dealing <physicalDamage>? physical damage</physicalDamage> to the first enemy hit in a small area. If Kha'Zix is inside the area, he restores <healing>? Health</healing>?

spells.name: Leap
spells.description: Kha'Zix leaps to an area, dealing physical damage upon landing. If he chooses to <font color='#00DD33'>Evolve Wings</font>, Leap's range increases by 200 and the cooldown resets on champion kill or assist.
spells.tooltip: Kha'Zix leaps, dealing <physicalDamage>? physical damage</physicalDamage> upon landing.?

spells.name: Void Assault
spells.description: Each rank allows Kha'Zix to evolve one of his abilities, giving it a unique additional effect. When activated, Kha'Zix becomes <font color='#91d7ee'>Invisible</font>, triggering Unseen Threat and increasing Move Speed. If he chooses to <font color='#00DD33'>Evolve Adaptive Cloaking</font>, Void Assault gains increased <font color='#91d7ee'>Invisibility</font> duration, and an additional use.
spells.tooltip:
Active: Kha'Zix becomes Invisible for ? seconds and gains ?% Move Speed. Kha'zix may Recast this Ability once within ? seconds.

Passive: Leveling up this Ability allows Kha'zix to Evolve one of his Abilities, granting it additional effects.
  • Taste Their Fear: Gain Ability range, Attack range, and lowers Cooldown by ?% against Isolated targets.
  • Void Spike: Fires 3 spikes and Slows by ?%, increased against Isolated targets.
  • Leap: Increased range and refreshes Cooldown on champion takedown.
  • Void Assault: Invisibility duration lasts ? seconds and gains second Recast.?

passive.name: Hemorrhage

spells.name: Decimate

spells.tooltip:
Darius hefts his axe then swings it around, dealing ? physical damage with the edge and ? damage with the handle. Enemies hit with the handle do not take a Hemorrhage stack.

Darius restores 13% missing Health per enemy champion and large jungle monster hit with the edge, up to a max of 39%.?

spells.name: Crippling Strike

spells.tooltip:
Darius' next Attack deals ? physical damage and Slows by 90% for 1 second.

This Ability refunds its Mana cost and reduces its Cooldown by 50% if it kills the target.

This Ability triggers spell effects upon dealing damage.?

spells.name: Apprehend

spells.tooltip:

Active: Darius hooks with his axe, Pulling, and Knocking Up and Slowing by 40% for 1 second.?

spells.name: Noxian Guillotine

spells.tooltip:
Darius leaps to an enemy and strikes a lethal blow, dealing ? true damage. For each Hemorrhage on the target, this Ability deals an additional ?% damage, up to a max of ? damage.

If this kills the target, Darius may Recast this Ability once within ? seconds. At rank 3, this Ability has no Mana cost and kills refresh the Cooldown completely.?

passive.name: Hextech Capacitor
passive.description: When Jayce swaps weapons he gains Move Speed for a short duration.

spells.name: To the Skies! / Shock Blast

Hammer Stance: Leaps to an enemy dealing physical damage and slowing enemies.

Cannon Stance: Fires an orb of electricity that detonates upon hitting an enemy (or reaching the end of its path) dealing physical damage to all enemies hit.
spells.tooltip: <keywordMajor>Mercury Hammer:</keywordMajor> Jayce leaps to an enemy, dealing <physicalDamage>? physical damage</physicalDamage> to surrounding enemies and <status>Slowing</status> them by ?% for ? seconds.?

spells.name: Lightning Field / Hyper Charge
