86.tooltip: When you damage someone from over 700 units away, Autocast a Trueshot Barrage at them, dealing @Damage@ damage at global range. 5s cooldown.Damage Dealt This Round: @f1@Damage Dealt Total: @f2@

87.name: Typhoon
87.desc: Your Attacks fire a bolt at an additional target dealing reduced damage and applying on-hits.
87.tooltip: Your Attacks fire a bolt at an additional target dealing 30% damage and applying on-hits.

88.name: Ultimate Revolution
88.desc: Once per round, refresh your Ultimate Ability after casting it.
88.tooltip: Once per round, refresh your Ultimate Ability after casting it.

89.name: Vanish
89.desc: Gain the Vanish Summoner SpellVanish turns you Invisible.
89.tooltip: Become Invisible for 4 seconds or until you Attack or use an Ability.This stealth cannot be revealed by the Arcane Sweeper trinket.

90.name: Vengeance
90.desc: After your partner dies, gain massively increased damage and Omnivamp for the remainder of the round.
90.tooltip: Gain 30% increased damage and 30% Omnivamp after your partner dies.Damage Dealt This Round: @f1@Damage Dealt Total: @f2@

91.name: Virtuous Cycle
91.desc: Your Heals grant extra Shield and your Shields grant extra Healing.
91.tooltip: Your Heals grans an extra 20% Shield and your Shields grant an extra 0.2% Healing.Healing Done Total: @f1@Shields Generated Total: @f2@

92.name: Vulnerability
92.desc: Your Item and damage over time effects can Critically Strike. Gain 20% Crit chance.
92.tooltip: Your Item and damage over time effects can Critically Strike for 50% extra damage. Gain 20% Crit chance.Damage Dealt This Round: @f1@Damage Dealt Total: @f2@

93.name: Warmup Routine
93.desc: Gain the Warmup Routine Summoner SpellWarmup Routine allows you to channel to increase your damage for the rest of the round.
93.tooltip: Channel to increase your damage by 2% per second, up to 24% max.Bonus Damage This Round: @f1@Bonus Damage Total: @f2@

94.name: Willing Sacrifice
94.desc: When your ally drops below 30% Health, trade some of your health for a Shield on your ally.
94.tooltip: When your ally drops below 30% Health, trade 25% of your current Health for that much Shield on your ally.Shields Generated This Round: @f1@Shields Generated Total: @f2@

95.name: Windspeaker's Blessing
95.desc: Your Healing and Shielding also increases the target's Armor and Magic Resist for 3 seconds.
95.tooltip: Your Healing and Shielding also increases the target's Armor and Magic Resist by @Resists@ for 3 seconds.

96.name: Wisdom of Ages
96.desc: Gain 1 level now, and 1 bonus level every other round. Your level cap is removed.
96.tooltip: Gain 1 level now, and 1 bonus level every other round. Your level cap is removed.

98.name: With Haste
98.desc: Gain Move Speed equal to 1.5 times your Ability Haste.
98.tooltip: Gain Move Speed equal to 1.5 times your Ability Haste.

99.name: Zhonya's Epiphany
99.desc: Gain the Zhonya's Epiphany Summoner Spell.Zhonya's Epiphany puts you in Stasis for 3 seconds, rendering you Untargetable and Invulnerable for the duration but also unable to act, and resetting your basic ability cooldowns.
99.tooltip: Puts you in Stasis for 3 seconds, rendering you Untargetable and Invulnerable for the duration but also unable to act, and resetting your basic ability cooldowns.

102.name: Don't Chase
102.desc: You become Ghosted and leave a trail of poisonous gas behind you, dealing magic damage to enemies caught in the path.
102.tooltip: Poisonous trail that deals @DamagePerSecond@ magic damage per second.Damage Dealt This Round: @f1@Damage Dealt Total: @f2@

104.name: Minionmancer
104.desc: Your summons gain 60% increased size, health, and damage.
104.tooltip: Your summons gain 60% increased size, health, and damage.

105.name: Homeguard
105.desc: Gain 100% Move Speed, disabled for 3 seconds after taking damage.
105.tooltip: Gain 100% Move Speed, disabled for 3 seconds after taking damage.

107.name: Twice Thrice
107.desc: Every third Attack, your On-Hits trigger a second time.
107.tooltip: Every third Attack, your On-Hits trigger a second time.

108.name: Self Destruct
108.desc: Start each round with a bomb attached to you. After 15 seconds, it explodes for 20% max Health true damage.
108.tooltip: Start each round with a bomb attached to you. After 15 seconds, it explodes for 20% max Health true damage and Knocks Up for 0.8 seconds.Damage Dealt this round: @f1@Damage Dealt total: @f2@

109.name: Oathsworn
109.desc: Replace Summoner Flee with Fate's Call Fate's Call pulls your partner to you for up to 4 seconds, makes them Untargetable. The partner can click to launch themselves, stopping at the first champion hit and Knocking Back all nearby enemies.
109.tooltip: Replace Summoner Flee with Fate's Call Fate's Call pulls your partner to you for up to 4 seconds, makes them Untargetable. The partner can click to launch themselves, stopping at the first champion hit and Knocking Back all nearby enemies.

110.name: Clothesline
110.desc: There is a tether between you and your partner that constantly damages enemies inside.
110.tooltip: There is a tether between you and your partner that deals @BurnDamageTooltip@ magic damage per second.Damage Dealt this Round: @f1@Damage Dealt Total: @f2@

112.name: Ultimate Unstoppable
112.desc: After using your Ultimate, you become CC Immune for 3 seconds. (8 second Cooldown).
112.tooltip: After using your Ultimate, you become CC Immune for 3 seconds. (8 second Cooldown).

113.name: Skilled Sniper
113.desc: Hitting an enemy with a non-ultimate ability at over 700 range reduces its cooldown to 0.5 seconds.
113.tooltip: Hitting an enemy with a non-ultimate ability at over 700 range reduces its cooldown to 0.5 seconds.

115.name: Scopiest Weapons
115.desc: Gain 250 Attack Range, reduced to 150 if you are Ranged.
115.tooltip: Gain 250 Attack Range, reduced to 150 if you are Ranged.

116.name: Flashy
116.desc: Your Flash has 3 Ammo and a 2 second Cooldown.
116.tooltip: Your Flash has 3 Ammo and a 2 second Cooldown.

118.name: Critical Healing
118.desc: Your Heals and Shields can Critically Strike. Gain 20% Crit Chance.
118.tooltip: Your Heals and Shields can Critically Strike for 50% bonus amount. Gain 20% Crit Chance. Bonus Healing: @f1@Bonus Shielding: @f2@

120.name: Serve Beyond Death
120.desc: The first time you would die each round, instead return to full health decaying over 3 seconds. Taking down an enemy champion while your health is decaying stops the decay and sets your health to 20% max Health.
120.tooltip: The first time you would die each round, instead return to full health decaying over 3 seconds. Taking down an enemy champion while your health is decaying stops the decay and sets your health to 20% max Health.

123.name: Summoner's Roulette
123.desc: Replace your Summoner spells with random ones. When you use a Summoner Spell in combat, replace it with another random one on a 6 second Cooldown.
123.tooltip: Replace your Summoner spells with random ones. When you use a Summoner Spell in combat, replace it with another random one on a 6 second Cooldown.

125.name: Raid Boss
125.desc: You start each round imprisoned in the center of the arena, unable to act. While imprisoned, you have 85% damage reduction based on missing Health and gain HP, AD, and AP over time (max 50%). After 9 seconds or reaching 50% Health, you burst out, Knocking Back enemies and gaining 35% max Health Shield.
125.tooltip: You start each round imprisoned in the center of the arena, unable to act. While imprisoned, you have 85% damage reduction based on missing Health and gain HP, AD, and AP over time (max 50%). After 9 seconds or reaching 50% Health, you burst out, Knocking Back enemies and gaining 35% max Health Shield.

129.name: Marksmage
129.desc: Your Attacks deal additional physical damage equal to 100% Ability Power.

133.name: Magic Missile
133.desc: Dealing damage with an active Ability fires 3 magic missiles at each enemy hit, each dealing up to 2.1% max Health true damage based on distance traveled.
133.tooltip: Dealing damage with an active Ability fires 3 magic missiles at each enemy hit, each dealing up to 2.1% max Health true damage based on distance traveled.Damage Dealt This Round:@f1@Damage Dealt Total: @f2@

134.name: Draw Your Sword
134.desc: You are now melee. Gain 35% Attack Damage, 35% Health, 25% Attack Speed, 25% Lifesteal, and 25% Move Speed (stats scale further with Attack Range).
134.tooltip: You are now melee. Gain 35% Attack Damage, 35% Health, 25% Attack Speed, 25% Lifesteal, and 25% Move Speed (stats scale further with Attack Range).

135.name: Spellwake
135.desc: Hitting enemies with Abilities creates a blast that deals magic damage from you to the location you hit them.
135.tooltip: Hitting enemies with active Abilities creates a blast that deals magic damage from you to the location you hit them.Damage Dealt This Round: @f1@Damage Dealt Total: @f2@

136.name: Slap Around
136.desc: Each time you Immobilize an enemy, gain 20 Adaptive Force for the round, stacking infinitely.
136.tooltip: Each time you Immobilize an enemy, gain 20 Adaptive Force for the round, stacking infinitely.

141.name: All For You
141.desc: Your Heals/Shields are 40% stronger when used on your partner.

149.name: Impassable
149.desc: Gain the Aftershock and Glacial Augment Keystone Runes
149.tooltip: Gain the Aftershock and Glacial Augment Keystone Runes

152.name: Quest: Steel Your Heart
152.desc: Requirement: Possess Heartsteel with 400+ stacks.Reward: Multiply your Heartsteel stacks by 3. Increase your health regen by 10% of your stacks.
152.tooltip: Requirement: Possess Heartsteel with 400+ stacks.Reward: Multiply your Heartsteel stacks by 3. Increase your health regen by 10% of your stacks.

156.name: Quest: Wooglet's Witchcap
156.desc: Immediate: Gain Needlessly Large Rod.Requirement: Possess Needlessly Large Rod, Rabadon's Deathcap, and Zhonya's Hourglass.Reward: Gain Wooglet's Witchcap.
156.tooltip: Immediate: Gain Needlessly Large Rod.Requirement: Possess Needlessly Large Rod, Rabadon's Deathcap, and Zhonya's Hourglass.Reward: Gain Wooglet's Witchcap.

165.name: Restart
165.desc: Your non-ultimate abilities refresh every 10 seconds.
165.tooltip: Your non-ultimate abilities refresh every 10 seconds.

166.name: Chain Lightning
166.desc: Dealing damage to an enemy also damages their ally for 50% true damage if they're nearby.

170.name: Scoped Weapons
170.desc: Gain 75 Attack Range, reduced to 50 if you are Ranged.
170.tooltip: Gain 75 Attack Range, reduced to 50 if you are Ranged.

171.name: Dematerialize
171.desc: Gain 30 Adaptive Force on takedown, once per champion per round.

172.name: Mirror Image
172.desc: When you drop below 30% Health, briefly disappear and create a clone of yourself.
172.tooltip: When you drop below 30% Health, briefly disappear and create a clone of yourself.

174.name: Laser Eyes
174.desc: There is a laser in the direction you are facing that deals @LaserEyesTooltip@ magic damage per second.
174.tooltip: There is a laser in the direction you are facing that deals @LaserEyesTooltip@ magic damage per second.Damage Dealt This Round: @f1@Damage Dealt Total: @f2@

175.name: Parasitic Relationship
175.desc: You heal for 15% of the damage dealt by your ally.
175.tooltip: You heal for 15% of damage done by your ally.Healing this round: @f1@Healing total: @f2@

176.name: Snowball Fight!
176.desc: Replace Summoner Flee with Mark. Throw a snowball that marks the first enemy hit and deals damage. Recast to dash to the marked enemy.
176.tooltip: Replace Summoner Flee with Mark. Throw a snowball that marks the first enemy hit and deals damage. Recast to dash to the marked enemy.

177.name: Nesting Doll
177.desc: When you die for the first time, revive as a smaller version of yourself with 75% maximum health and deal 75% damage. If you die again, revive as an even smaller version of yourself with 50% maximum health and deal 50% damage.When you revive, Knockback enemies around you.
177.tooltip: When you die for the first time, revive as a smaller version of yourself with 75% maximum health and deal 75% damage. If you die again, revive as an even smaller version of yourself with 50% maximum health and deal 50% damage.When you revive, Knockback enemies around you.

180.name: Big Brain
180.desc: At the start of the round, gain 3 Shield for every %i:scaleAP% 1 Ability Power.
180.tooltip: At the start of the round, gain 3 Shield for every %i:scaleAP% 1 Ability Power.

181.name: Heavy Hitter
181.desc: Your Attacks deal additional physical damage equal to 5% of your max Health.
181.tooltip: Your Attacks deal additional physical damage equal to 5% of your max Health.

187.name: Flashbang
187.desc: When you Flash, there is an explosion around you dealing @ExplosiveDamage@ magic damage  and Slowing by 35% for 1.3 seconds. Additionally, Flash resets every round.

192.name: Angel of Retribution
192.desc: Requirement: Restore or prevent 2500 damage to allies.Reward: Gain 100% Attack Speed, and your Attacks deal additional magic damage equal to 300% Heal/Shield Power.

193.name: Center of the Universe
193.desc: Stars orbit you at your Attack Range, dealing @StarDamage@ magic damage to enemies they pass through.

194.name: Fey Magic
194.desc: Damaging with your ultimate Polymorphs enemies for 1.5 seconds (8 second Cooldown).
194.tooltip: Damaging with your ultimate Polymorphs enemies for 1.5 seconds (8 second Cooldown).

195.name: Giant Slayer
195.desc: Become tiny, gain 30% Move Speed, and deal between 15% and 35% bonus damage to champions based on how much larger they are than you.
195.tooltip: Become tiny, gain 30% Move Speed, and deal between 15% and 35% bonus damage to champions based on how much larger they are than you.

198.name: Holy Fire
198.desc: Your Healing and Shielding applies a stacking Burn to a nearby enemy.

200.name: Blood Brother
200.desc: Gain Darius's Passive Hemorrhage.Attacks and damaging Abilities cause the target to Hemorrhage, dealing @BleedDamagePerStack@ physical damage over 5 seconds, stacking up to 5 times.Draven gains  @NoxianMightBonusAD@ Attack Damage at 5 Hemorrhage stacks.
200.tooltip: Gain Darius's Passive Hemorrhage.Attacks and damaging Abilities cause the target to Hemorrhage, dealing @BleedDamagePerStack@ physical damage over 5 seconds, stacking up to 5 times.Draven gains  @NoxianMightBonusAD@ Attack Damage at 5 Hemorrhage stacks.

204.name: Stackosaurus Rex
204.desc: When you gain permanent Stacks of an Ability, gain 100% more!

205.name: ADAPt
205.desc: Convert Bonus Attack Damage to Ability Power. Gain 10% Ability Power.
205.tooltip: Convert Bonus Attack Damage to Ability Power. Gain 10% Ability Power.

206.name: escAPADe
206.desc: Convert Ability Power to Bonus Attack Damage. Gain 10% Attack Damage.
206.tooltip: Convert Ability Power to Bonus Attack Damage. Gain 10% Attack Damage.

207.name: Hold Very Still
207.desc: Gain Guerrilla WarfareAfter not moving for 1.5 seconds, turn Invisibile until you move. When you exit this Invisibility, gain @BonusAS@ Attack Speed.
207.tooltip: Gain Guerrilla WarfareAfter not moving for 1.5 seconds, turn Invisibile until you move. When you exit this Invisibility, gain @BonusAS@ Attack Speed.

208.name: Orbital Laser
208.desc: Replace Summoner Flee with Orbital Laser. After a delay, call down an orbital laser that deals 20% max Health true damage plus @TotalDamageOverTimeTooltip@ magic damage over 3 seconds.

210.name: Backstab
210.desc: You gain 30% bonus damage and Omnivamp when hitting an enemy from behind.
210.tooltip: You gain 30% bonus damage and Omnivamp when hitting an enemy from behind.Damage Dealt: @f1@Healing Done: @f2@

211.name: It's Killing Time
211.desc: After casting your ultimate, mark all enemy champions for death. The mark stores 30% of damage dealt to them, then detonates for the stored damage after 5 seconds. (8 second Cooldown).

213.name: Fully Automated
213.desc: Your Autocast Cooldowns are reduced by 3 seconds and benefit from your Ability Haste.
213.tooltip: Your Autocast Cooldowns are reduced by 3 seconds and benefit from your Ability Haste.

214.name: Spin To Win
214.desc: Your spin Abilities gain 20 Ability Haste and deal 20% more damage!

215.name: Dark Blessing
215.desc: When you Heal/Shield, apply 2 stacks of Curse to a nearby enemy enemy champion for 5 seconds, stacking infinitely.

216.name: Plaguebearer
216.desc: You apply 4 stacks of Curse per second to nearby enemy champions for 5 seconds, stacking infinitely.{{ Cherry_Curse_WithTracker }}
216.tooltip: You apply 4 stacks of Curse per second to nearby enemy champions for 5 seconds, stacking infinitely.{{ Cherry_Curse_WithTracker }}

217.name: Deathtouch
217.desc: Your Attacks apply 1 stack of Curse for 5 seconds, stacking infinitely.{{ Cherry_Curse_WithTracker }}
217.tooltip: Your Attacks apply 1 stack of Curse for 5 seconds, stacking infinitely.{{ Cherry_Curse }}Health stolen last round: @f1@Health stolen total: @f2@

218.name: Desecrator
218.desc: Immobilizing enemy champions applies 3 stacks of Curse for 5 seconds, stacking infinitely.{{ Cherry_Curse_WithTracker }}
218.tooltip: Immobilizing enemy champions applies 3 stacks of Curse for 5 seconds, stacking infinitely.{{ Cherry_Curse_WithTracker }}

219.name: Doomsayer
219.desc: Your Abilities apply 2 stacks of Curse to enemy champions they hit for 5 seconds, stacking infinitely.{{ Cherry_Curse_WithTracker }}
219.tooltip: Your Abilities apply 2 stacks of Curse to enemy champions they hit for 5 seconds, stacking infinitely.{{ Cherry_Curse_WithTracker }}

messages.역할군과 라인전, 킬/데스/데미지/시야장악/오브젝트 파괴 등의 지표를 종: A rating system that measures a users performance within a game by combining stats related to role, laning phase, kills / deaths / damage / wards / damage to objectives etc.
messages.SUMMONER_OP_SCORE_FEATURE_DESC: The improved OP Score allows precise tracking of the user’s stats based on their play time. The OP Score is calculated every 5 minutes in ranked and regular games, and every 3 minutes in the Howling Abyss, allowing for a more detailed analysis of the player’s performance.
messages.해당 경기에서 가장 뛰어난 활약을 보여준 1명: The summoner that performed the best in the match

Scores are from 0-10 based upon your contributions to the match.
messages.탈주 등 패배에 결정적인 영향을 끼친 경우 0점에 가까운 점수가 부여됩니: Contributing heavily to your team's loss, such as AFK, will bring your score close to zero.
messages.OP스코어는 현재 베타 테스트 기간으로, 각 게임의 특성에 따라 다소 부: For OP Score's beta test, based on the characteristics of each match your results may be somewhat inaccurate
messages.각각의 지표 또는 가중치를 지속적으로 조정해 가장 객관적인 지표를 찾기: We will keep trying to improve the indicators and calculations used in OP Score so we can create the most objective rating possible. Please give us any feedback.

messages.장인 랭킹의 정렬 기준이 다이아 2 이상 + 게임을 많이 한 순서로 변경: Champion experts are ranked based on the number of games played in Diamond 2 or higher.
messages.채팅창의 내용을 붙여 넣으면, 게임에 참여중인 모든 유저를 요약하여 볼: Copy and paste information from chat to view summaries of all summoners in the game.
messages.검색 결과와 일치하는 소환사가 없습니다. 정확하게 붙여넣으신건지, 소환사: Summoner, your search returned no matches. Please paste the exact summoner names. Check for typos or special characters.
messages.SPECTATE_GAMES_NOTFOUND: There are currently no available games to spectate.
messages.SUMMONER_SEARCH_GUIDE_DESC_PASTSEASONTIE: You can view a Summoner's ranked record for season {{value1}} to {{value2}}.
messages.SUMMONER_SEARCH_GUIDE_DESC_RECENT_GAMES_: You can view a summary of details entirely solo ranked, team ranked, normal games.
messages.SUMMONER_SEARCH_GUIDE_DESC_CHAMPIONS_KDA: You can view a Summoner's Pick-rate, Win-rate and KDA. for every Champion.
messages.SUMMONER_SPECTATE_OPEN_CURRENT_MATCH_REC: You can watch the replay or record. (Click on the '{{value}}' button)
messages.롤 몇 시간 했는지 궁금해?: How many hours did you play LOL?
messages.RANKING_SUMMONER_TITLE: LoL Leaderboards - Checkout who is the best player by regions!
messages.RANKING_SUMMONER_DESCRIPTION: OP.GG player leaderboards provide multiple filters such as region, tier, and modes. Find out who is the best in the selected filters.
messages.HELP_OBSERVER_REQUIRED_DESC_CANNOT_SMART: Cannot spectate on mobile devices as they cannot install the LoL client.
messages.HELP_OBSERVER_REQUIRED_DESC_USE_CHROME_I: If you are using Firefox, change the name of the file before you download because Firefox cannot download .bat files, or you can use<0>Google Chrome</0>.
messages.HELP_OBSERVER_VIRUS_TITLE: When you receive an error message saying the file may be harmful to your computer.
messages.HELP_OBSERVER_VIRUS_DESC_IECHROME_WARNIN: If you are using either Internet Explorer or Google Chrome, you will automatically receive a message as a result of downloading a ".bat" file.  This file does not contain any virus or malware and can be executed safely by following the step-by-step instructions provided below.
messages.HELP_OBSERVER_VIRUS_DESC_CHROME: If you are using Google Chrome, clicking the arrow on the right will begin the download process.
messages.HELP_OBSERVER_VIRUS_DESC_IE: When using Internet Explorer, press the 'Advance' button to continue downloading.
messages.HELP_OBSERVER_VIRUS_DESC_WIN8IE: If you are using Internet Explorer on Windows 8, click on Additional Information to begin downloading.
messages.HELP_OBSERVER_BUGREPORTERROR_TITLE: When you experience a bug related error.
messages.HELP_OBSERVER_BUGREPORTERROR_DESC: This is most likely a LoL client error. Delete then reinstall your LoL client.
messages.HELP_OBSERVER_CANNOTFOUNDLOLEXE_TITLE: League of legend.exe file can not be found.
messages.HELP_OBSERVER_CANNOTFOUNDLOLEXE_DESC_STE: Right click on the LoL shortcut, then click on properties.
Copy the location in the “Start in:” column of the shortcut tab.
Click the <0>Setting LOL location</0> button and paste.
messages.HELP_OBSERVER_LOLERROR_FAILEDDUMP_ER3_TI: When you receive a "failed to create dump file: (error3)" message while spectating.
messages.HELP_OBSERVER_LOLERROR_FAILEDDUMP_ER3_DE: Delete then reinstall your LoL client.
A hard, complicated way (Can solve quickly)
It goes to the folder where LOL is installed.
In that folder, locate the 'rads' folder and change the name to 'RADS'. Make sure all the letters are capitalized. If the name does not change, first change it to RADS_ then back to RADS.
messages.HELP_OBSERVER_NOTBATFILE_TITLE: if the filename extension of your file is not .bat
messages.HELP_OBSERVER_NOTBATFILE_DESC: Rename your file with .bat at the end.
messages.HELP_OBSERVER_CANNOTRUN_DESC_STEP_FINDCM: Right click ->Open with-> Choose program-> Type C:\Windows\system32\cmd.exe -> OK
messages.HELP_OBSERVER_CANNOTRUN_DESC_DELETE_SITE: Delete AhnLab Siteguard if it is installed.
messages.HELP_OBSERVER_UNKNOWNERROR_TITLE: When you experience an unknown error when opening the file.
messages.HELP_OBSERVER_UNKNOWNERROR_DESC_SAVE_INS: After downloading, do not click "Run," but rather click "Save" and then open the file.
messages.HELP_OBSERVER_UNKNOWNERROR_DESC_RUNONADM: Right-click on the spectator file and select "Run as admin."
messages.화면이 까맣게 되어 아무런 진행이 되지 않는 경우: When your screen goes black and there is no progress.
messages.녹화된 시간이 오래된 게임이라면, 롤 클라이언트의 패치로 인해 재생이 불: If the match you're trying to watch is an old match, the LoL client may not be able to run the file due to client patches. LoL client patches may have changed certain features causing older replays to no longer work.
messages.OP.GG의 재생 서버에 장애가 발생하였을 수 있습니다. 대부분의 경우: OP.GG's playback server may be experiencing some difficulties. These errors are usually resolved in a few hours.
